metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Those Bold City Girls is more complex than the typical song, having above average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension and Chord Progression Novelty.
key_conclusion: Those Bold City Girls has sections analyzed in the following keys: B Minor,  and D Major.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
